msg: If you don’t do your revision properly, you know what’ll happen? YOU SHALL NOT PASS!
author: ― IAN MCKELLEN

msg: Just believe in yourself. Even if you don’t, pretend that you do and, at some point, you will.
author: ― VENUS WILLIAMS

msg: If you think you can do a thing or think you can’t do a thing, you’re right.
author: ― HENRY FORD

msg: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
author: ― JOHN F. KENNEDY

msg: I do not try to dance better than anyone else. I only try to dance better than myself.
author: ― ARIANNA HUFFINGTON
